projectSlogan: Bringing a social and gamified approach to collect human-classified data at scale from verified users

features.title: Verified User Ecosystem
features.details: We ensure the quality and integrity of data by implementing advanced user verification systems. This includes identity checks and reputation-based eligibility to resist bots and onboard users with proven expertise in specific domain

features.title: Scalable Data Generation
features.details: TagFi leverages gamification and social engagement through TikTok/Instagram-style reels, empowering users to generate classified, high-quality datasets across categories at scale

features.title: Intelligent Reward System
features.details: Utilizing AI-driven incentive mechanisms through Coinbase SDK, TagFi ensures proportional rewards based on user reputation and the value of their classified contributions

projectDetails.title: What Is Our Project About?
projectDetails.description1: TagFi is an innovative platform designed to solve the dual challenges of verified user-generated content and scalable data classification for AI model training.
projectDetails.description2: By merging advanced user verification, gamified experiences, and AI-based rewards, TagFi ensures the generation of high-quality, proprietary datasets. It aims to bridge the gap between data consumers and verified content creators while enabling a sustainable data economy.

userFlow.title: Streamlined User Journeys
userFlow.description: Seamless workflows designed to enable scalable and efficient data generation.

steps.text: User undergoes verification and creates a TagFi profile through Privado ID integration.
Access quests via a marketplace interface tailored for classification and content generation.
Classify data (e.g., images) or generate content using mobile tools, filters, or direct uploads.
Data is verified by peer reviewers or automated mechanisms as per consumer rules.
Users receive proportional rewards based on reputation and contribution quality.

challenges.title: Overcoming Barriers
challenges.subtitle: Addressing critical hurdles in scaling verified human intelligence for AI training datasets

challengesList.title: Ensuring User Authenticity
challengesList.description: Implementing robust verification mechanisms to resist bots and ensure legitimate user participation.

challengesList.title: Scaling Data Contribution
challengesList.description: Encouraging users to consistently generate high-quality datasets through engaging and rewarding activities.

challengesList.title: Reward Optimization
challengesList.description: Balancing rewards to ensure proportional and fair distribution based on contribution quality.

challengesList.title: Proportional Reward Systems
challengesList.description: Creating an AI-driven, reputation-based reward mechanism that incentives meaningful contributions while maintaining fairness
